title: Color Frenzy
description: Use a loop to draw an 8-bit pattern.

steps.hint: Weâ€™ll just use solid shapes with no stroke. So **type** `stroke 0`.
For this one lets use two loops, one to go horizontally across the screen, and one to go down vertically. **Type** `for x in [ 0 .. 20 ]`
The second loop should be `for y in [ 0 .. 20 ]`
Set the color with `color rotate red, x * 10`
Move into position with `moveTo x * 25, y * 25`
Finally, lets add some randomness to the mix. **Type** `square random 20, 25`

completion_text: Well done! The random function will return a random value between 20 and 25. When combined with the loop it produces an interesting effect.
